resources.string: An error has occurred
No connection found. Please check your network configuration and retry.
The server is unavailable.
Invalid user or password.
You are using a different version from the server. The fruit name in both version must match. Please make updates accordingly.
Cash register not found. Please check the machine name in configuration to match a registered one
Invalid stock location. Please check your configuration.
Unable to restore all data. Please update data before starting.
Unable to save session. You may lose tickets that were not paid already.
Unable to save catalog. Quitting the application may leave no products available.
Unable to save compositions. Quitting the application may leave compositions unaffected.
Unable to save tariff areas. Quitting the application may leave no area available.
Unable to save payment modes. Quitting the application may leave no way to pay tickets.
Unable to save users. Quitting the application may prevent you to log in.
Unable to save customers. Quitting the application may leave no customers available.
Unable to save cash register. Opening a new cash may result in strange behaviour
Unable to save cash state. Open/close date may be lost when leaving the application.
No cash found. Updating data may solve the problem
Unable to save receipts. You may lose them if you quit the application without sending the data to the server.
Unable to save places. You may lose them if you quit the application.
Unable to save stocks. You may not be able to check your stock you quit the application.
Unable to save resource. Some features may be missing.
Unable to load a previous cash session.
The synchronization failed partially or totally.
A cash session is running. Unable to switch to new cash register.
This application cannot connect to Payleven.
An other transaction is running, please wait and retry.
Service unavailable, please try later.
You cannot use Payleven in this country of for this currency.
Error while reading Json, data might be corrupted
Error saving customer locally
Error saving customer to server
